nbastatR
  • Reference

Player career stats

NBA player career statistics for specified players and inputs

get_players_career_stats(players = NULL, player_ids = NULL,
  modes = c("PerGame", "Totals"), assign_to_environment = TRUE,
  add_mode_names = TRUE, return_message = TRUE)

Arguments

players

NULL or vector of NBA players
player_ids

vector of NBA Player IDs
modes

vector of items that can include

  • Totals

  • PerGame

  • Per36
assign_to_environment

if TRUE assign to each table environment with a name starting with data
add_mode_names

if TRUE adds the type of mode to the table data
return_message

if TRUE returns a message

Value

a data_frame

See also

Other player: get_bref_players_bios, get_players_awards, get_players_tables_data, get_years_draft_combines

Examples

# NOT RUN {
get_players_career_stats(players = c("Joe Harris", "Myles Turner", "Spencer Dinwiddie"),
modes = c("Totals", "PerGame"))
# }

Contents

  • Value
